p: The best‐fitting model was inferred from the initial full LMM (Equation (1)) using information‐theoretic model selection (Burnham & Anderson, 2002). A repeated evaluation of all possible 2 15 model combinations that included all combinations of variables shown in the full model (Equation (1)) was conducted using the Bayesian Information Criterion (BIC; Aho, Derryberry, & Peterson, 2014) and maximum likelihood estimation (ML; Burnham & Anderson, 2002). A model with a lower BIC score indicates a better‐fitting model.
